name: proposal-team
description: Multi-agent federal proposal development system for VS Code Chat

chatParticipants.name: proposal-team
chatParticipants.description: Multi-agent federal proposal development assistant. Orchestrates specialized agents to analyze solicitations, create outlines, draft sections, and review proposals.

commands.name: setup
commands.description: Set up project directory structure for proposal development

commands.name: analyze
commands.description: Analyze a solicitation — extract requirements, evaluation factors, risks, Q&A candidates

commands.name: outline
commands.description: Create a Blue Outline with section-by-section writing instructions

commands.name: draft
commands.description: Draft one or more proposal sections as proposal-ready prose

commands.name: review
commands.description: Run a multi-agent proposal review with debate rounds

commands.name: run
commands.description: Run the complete proposal workflow: analyze → outline → draft → review
